headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Falls Following Tariff Announcements
summary: The S&P 500 fell 0.8% on Monday, Feb. 3, as investors reacted to tariffs on major U.S. trading partners while awaiting key earnings and labor market data.

headline: Idexx Stock, AbbVie, and Molina Buck Downward Tariff Trend. These Are Today’s Top S&P 500 Performers.
summary: Idexx Laboratories  stock was rising sharply Monday, even as the  and major indexes remained in the red.  The  rebounded some 500 points after President Donald Trump halted his plans for 25% tariffs on imports from Mexico for a month.  Shares of  Idexx Laboratories  were up 12% on Monday and on track for the largest same-day percentage increase since Nov. 10, 2022, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

headline: Why IDXX Is Soaring Today
summary: Pet healthcare firm Idexx (IDXX) is jumping 10% after delivering better-than-expected fourth-quarter financial results. The midpoint of the company’s 2025 earnings per share guidance range also came in above analysts’ average outlook. Idexx’s Q4 Results and Its 2025 Guidance The company’s Q4 sales rose 5.8% versus the same period a year earlier to $954 million. […]

headline: Why Is Pet Health Company IDEXX Laboratories Stock Trading Higher On Monday?
summary: IDEXX Laboratories Inc (NASDAQ:IDXX) reported fourth-quarter adjusted EPS of $2.53, up 10% year-over-year, beating the consensus of $2.40. The pet healthcare company reported sales of $954.3 million, beating the consensus of $934.99 million, up 6% on a reported and organic basis in the fourth quarter, driven by Companion Animal Group (CAG) growth of 6% as reported and organically to $870.47 million.
